# Heatmap with Ordering Weights

```{r}
library(ggalign)
```

```{r}
set.seed(123)
# Prepare heatmap matrix
mat <- matrix(
    rnorm(100, mean = 0, sd = 2),
    nrow = 10, ncol = 10,
    dimnames = list(paste0("G", 1:10), paste0("S", 1:10))
)
```

Order the observations based on the means.
```{r}
ggheatmap(mat) +
    anno_left() +
    align_order(rowMeans)
```
